topic.title: 버스에 두고 내린 물건 신고하기
topic.description: 버스에 물건을 두고 내렸을 때 분실물 센터에 연락하여 상황을 설명하고 물건을 찾는 방법을 배웁니다.

korean_scripts.korean_text: 오늘 아침에 143번 버스를 탔는데, 가방을 두고 내린 것 같아요.
혹시 검은색 백팩 들어온 거 있나요?
제가 어디로 가면 가방을 찾을 수 있을까요?

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: Hello, I'm calling about a lost item on the bus.
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: Hello, | I'm calling about a lost item | on the bus.

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: I was on the 143 bus this morning, and I think I left my bag.
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: I was on the 143 bus | this morning, || and I think I left my bag.

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: Has a black backpack **come in** by any chance?
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: Has a black backpack | **come in** | by any chance?

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: There's a laptop and a wallet inside the bag.
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: There's a laptop | and a wallet | inside the bag.

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: Okay, **I'll visit tomorrow morning**. Thank you.
